item.description:
Special meeting Aug. 7th "VFR Chart Smarts" by Dick Neher

So, you think you know what all those sqiggly lines mean on VFR Charts? Think again, Becha don't!

Dick Neher will be explaining the new updates and changes. This is an Oshkosh style event. Not to be missed.
Bring your questions.
Brought to us by the hard work once again by Jim Bisson.

Also, this will be our raffle drawing date for the Aviator Headset and the Jepp flight bag. Great stuff donated by Gregg Hathaway.
Raffle tickets will be on sale soon, stay tuned for more info.

As always, dinner at 6:00, meeting at 7:00.

group.name: Fitchburg Pilots Association/EAA Chapter 1454 Meetup Site

item.name: August Meeting DATE CHANGE "VFR Charts Smarts" and Raffle Drawing
